      Methods in org.wildfly.security.auth.server that return RealmIdentity 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RealmIdentity SecurityDomain.getIdentity​(java.lang.String name)
      Look up a RealmIdentity by name by wrapping the name in a NamePrincipal and calling SecurityDomain.getIdentity(Principal).
      RealmIdentity SecurityDomain.getIdentity​(java.security.Principal principal)
      Look up a RealmIdentity by principal.
      default RealmIdentity SecurityRealm.getRealmIdentity​(java.security.Principal principal)
      Get a handle for to the identity for the given principal in the context of this security realm.
      default RealmIdentity SecurityRealm.getRealmIdentity​(Evidence evidence)
      Get a handle for to the identity for the given evidence in the context of this security realm.
      default RealmIdentity SecurityRealm.getRealmIdentity​(Evidence evidence, java.util.function.Function<java.security.Principal,​java.security.Principal> principalTransformer)
      Get a handle for the identity for the given evidence in the context of this security realm.
